overview: most popular and emblematic places in Mexico City, not only for its ecotourism, but also for its flora and fauna, the traditional trajineras and its small islands full of life and stories to tell. However, and despite what it may seem, Xochimilco is not the perfect oasis that can be seen under the lens of the public eye. A dialogue is presented between the urban area and the decaying natural areas of the city.
title: El Lugar Que Aún Respira
